environment.name: PATH
environment.value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Intel\Compiler\C++\9.1\EM64T\Bin;C:\ACE\Intel91_64bit\ACE_wrappers\bin;C:\ACE\Intel91_64bit\ACE_wrappers\lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Bin\Win64\x86\AMD64;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Bin\WinNT;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\NoRedist\Win64\AMD64;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\bin;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\VC\bin;C:\Cygwin\bin;C:\ACE\Intel91_64bit\ACE_wrappers\bin;C:\ACE\Intel91_64bit\ACE_wrappers\lib

environment.name: INCLUDE
environment.value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Intel\Compiler\C++\9.1\EM64T\Include;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual C++ Toolkit 2003\include

environment.name: LIB
environment.value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Intel\Compiler\C++\9.1\EM64T\Lib;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Lib\AMD64;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Lib\AMD64\atlmfc

environment.name: Include
environment.value: C:\Program Files (x86)\Intel\Compiler\C++\9.1\EM64T\Include;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include\crt;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include\crt\sys;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include\mfc;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 8\Include\atl

command.name: generate_workspace
command.options: -value_template add_compile+=/Qwr1736 -value_template add_compile+=/Qwr1738 -value_template add_compile+=/Qwr1744 -value_template add_compile+=/Qwr1684 -type nmake -base vc8nmake -exclude TAO_*.mwc,TAO/CIAO -value_template machine=AMD64 -value_template cc=icl.exe -value_template link=xilink.exe -value_template platforms=x64
